snippet: In “A Million Heavens,” John Brandon places thoughtful people and animals in a small New Mexico town.
abstract: John Williams reviews book A Million Heavens by John Brandon.
lead_paragraph: In “A Million Heavens,” John Brandon places thoughtful people and animals in a small New Mexico town.

headline.main: Heads in the Clouds Amid a Cloudless Landscape
